General.Name: SCGM Bhd
General.Description: SCGM Bhd, an investment holding company, manufactures and trades in plastic products and medical protective equipment in Malaysia. It offers thermoform food and beverage plastic packaging products, and takeaway containers and trays. The company also engages in the development, production, and supply of medical-grade face masks and face shields. It also exports its products. SCGM Bhd offers its products under the Benxon brand. The company serves food and beverage, electronics, and medical industries. SCGM Bhd was founded in 1984 and is based in Kulai, Malaysia.
